Pre-Game Insights: England captain Jos Buttler criticized the poor outfield conditions at the HPCA Stadium, expressing concerns about player safety and the integrity of the game.
The International Cricket Council rated the outfield as 'average,' but match referee Javagal Srinath was satisfied after inspection.
England was unimpressed with the conditions despite two training days at the venue, feeling it falls short of international standards.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Ben Stokes is likely to miss the match due to injury, with Reece Topley possibly replacing him in the starting XI.
Eoin Morgan highlighted Ben Stokes' increased influence on the team, both on the field and in the dressing room.
